name: Windows 3.1
installation: Attach the first MS-DOS floppy to the VM
Boot from the MS-DOS floppy and follow the installation process
After the installation is complete, attach the first Windows 3.1 floppy to the VM
Type `A:` and press enter to open the Windows 3.1 floppy
Type `setup.exe` and press enter to begin Windows 3.1 Setup
When the setup is complete, type `WIN` and press enter to start Windows 3.1. You have to run this command every time you start the virtual machine.
notes: If you are not able to move the mouse, try clicking the mouse capture button in the toolbar. You can then press Control + Option to release the cursor.
